page.title: 04Recreation in Pimperne.
page.content: From our survey we saw that over half of those who replied took some sort of exercise or recreation.Some played major games like football,cricket, rugby or golf.Some played badminton, squash or went swimming.A few went horse riding,fishing,gliding,dancing. Nearly all had to go out of Pimperne, to Blandford or further,to take part. Some kept fit by jogging or going to keep fit classes or gardening.Many walked to keep fit and to enjoy the country side.Just over a third went to the theatre occasionally,many more would like to have gone but found the journey to Bournemouth,Poole or Salisbury and the price of theatre tickets too expensive.About half the people who answered read alot.About the same number watch a lot of television.
